channel.title: Fall '22 Week 1 :: CIS 527 Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video Resources Slides Video Script Hello, and welcome to the week one Announcements video for CC 510. In Fall 2022, I’m Russ Feldhausen. I’ll be your instructor for this semester, my contact information is here. It’s also on the syllabus, it’s easy to get ahold of me. For this course, email is preferred. So please email me at russfeld@ksu.edu. But you can also chat with me on Discord, I’m @russfeld.
